name: rustling
content:
rustling noun
(NOISE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] the sound that paper or leaves make when they move: I could hear (a) rustling in the bushes. A small animal was making rustling noises among the leaves.

rustling noun
(STEALING)
[ U ] the crime of stealing farm animals
